gluttony.question: Did you indulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, perhaps at family gatherings or social events?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: above my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I put my own recreational activities or indulgences above my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations and family needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively prioritized leisure activities, such as travel or hobbies, over my financial obligations and family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
about people from my community or social circles
from my community or social circles
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true about people from my community or social circles?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I engaged in discussing others' private lives, even if what I shared was true, especially when doing so among friends or family during social gatherings?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing stories or information about my friends , family members , or acquaintances that were intended for private discussion among our group
about my friends , family members , or acquaintances that were intended for private discussion among our group
for private discussion among our group
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing stories or information about my friends, family members, or acquaintances that were intended for private discussion among our group?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: by not keeping holy His day
impiety.question: Did I engage in work on Sunday when it could have been avoided, thus offending God by not keeping holy His day?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
